entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yoho (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:16 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yoho National Park 01:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -22.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -25.1°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
